summary: This mod add small farm where yo can obtain you own piggy
descriptionHtml:
Right now I am working as a level designer on a DLC sized mod, well honestly what I saw its even bigger than a vanilla game but mainly I dont have a time to finish this stuff btw check this out:

http://theelderscrolls.fr/threads/vid%C3%A9oth%C3%A8que.3730/


Assistance request:
I want to ask if somone can help me with making standalone piggies only what I can do is to replace vannila boars if I want to make an standalone they are always invisible. If is someone here who can help me I would be very happy. And finnaly release new update with more piggies :D

This mod allows you to ride on a boar (bristleback). You can obtain your own piggy in a small farm near Fort Greymoor

And of course The Dragonborn DLC is needed

How to install optional files:
unrar Boar replacer.rar > open boarudelany > choose your favorite piggie > open and put it in your Skyrim data. ! Choose only one !

in this time this mod is in WIP in future you can expect more boar types.

Bugs?

It is my first mod ever so you can expect something :D but I didn find it yet
author: Morloq337
